text: HBO Max’s new TV and movie releases for December 16-22 2024 include Two Guys Garage Season 23, Very Scary People Season 6, The Head Season 3, and JUROR #2. On December 16, Two Guys Garage Season 23 drops on the streaming platform. The reality show follows hosts Willie B. and Kevin Byrd’s fascination for cars. They wish to give a brand-new look to every car no matter how old or damaged it might appear. However, the journey of rebranding is filled with hard work and endless struggles. Further, Very Scary People Season 6 will be available on HBO Max on the same day. The documentary series follows the lives of brutal criminals from Charles Manson to Jim Jones. As the season progresses, viewers delve deep into the twisted but shocking secrets of the culprits that have been kept away from the public eye. Also coming out on the streaming platform is the thriller drama series The Head Season 3 on December 19. It showcases a group of scientists in the South Pole during the winter season. However, things take a shocking turn when several team members are found dead by commander Johan Berg. Additionally, the film JUROR #2 will be available on the platform this week. It chronicles the rollercoaster journey of a juror named Justin Kemp. His life takes a shocking turn when he finds himself in a dilemma in a complicated murder case. Thus, begins a journey of Kemp trying to balance his personal and professional life. New HBO Max releases for December 16-22, 2024 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to HBO Max from December 16-22, 2024. (CNN) December 19  Rose Matafeo: On and On and On (Max Original) The Head Season 3 (Max Original) Texas Cheerleader Murder Plot (ID) Fast Friends (Max Original) December 20  X-Rated Queen Season 1 (Max Original) Juror #2 (Max Original) December 21 Evolve and Flex Episode 3 December 22  Build for Off-Road Season 1 24-Karat Christmas (OWN) For more HBO Max content, check out the trailer of Fast Friends. html:
HBO Max’s new TV and movie releases for December 16-22 2024 include Two Guys Garage Season 23, Very Scary People Season 6, The Head Season 3, and JUROR #2.

On December 16, Two Guys Garage Season 23 drops on the streaming platform. The reality show follows hosts Willie B. and Kevin Byrd’s fascination for cars. They wish to give a brand-new look to every car no matter how old or damaged it might appear. However, the journey of rebranding is filled with hard work and endless struggles.

Further, Very Scary People Season 6 will be available on HBO Max on the same day. The documentary series follows the lives of brutal criminals from Charles Manson to Jim Jones. As the season progresses, viewers delve deep into the twisted but shocking secrets of the culprits that have been kept away from the public eye.

Also coming out on the streaming platform is the thriller drama series The Head Season 3 on December 19. It showcases a group of scientists in the South Pole during the winter season. However, things take a shocking turn when several team members are found dead by commander Johan Berg.

Additionally, the film JUROR #2 will be available on the platform this week. It chronicles the rollercoaster journey of a juror named Justin Kemp. His life takes a shocking turn when he finds himself in a dilemma in a complicated murder case. Thus, begins a journey of Kemp trying to balance his personal and professional life.

New HBO Max releases for December 16-22, 2024

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to HBO Max from December 16-22, 2024.

December 16 

  • Very Scary People Season 6 (ID)
  • White House Christmas (HGTV)
  • Truck U Season 20
  • Two Guys Garage Season 23

December 17 

  • Dr. Sanjay Gupta Reports: Is Ozempic Right For You? (CNN)

December 19 

  • Rose Matafeo: On and On and On (Max Original)
  • The Head Season 3 (Max Original)
  • Texas Cheerleader Murder Plot (ID)
  • Fast Friends (Max Original)

December 20 

  • X-Rated Queen Season 1 (Max Original)
  • Juror #2 (Max Original)

December 21

  • Evolve and Flex Episode 3

December 22 

  • Build for Off-Road Season 1
  • 24-Karat Christmas (OWN)

For more HBO Max content, check out the trailer of Fast Friends. Also here is an exciting update of the Harry Potter show.
